name: ButlerCountyOhioWeatherUpdates
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: In this flash briefing wondering if the weather is bad out check in with the flash briefing to see if the National Weather Service has issued any kind of alerts for the Butler County area. If it sounds like Alexa stopped mid-sentence go to the Alexa app. Then look at the home screen you will see the alert and select the read more to be taken to the National Weather Services website for this alert. **This is not to be used a primary way to get alerts from the National Weather Service.** Always use a weather radio or your favorite resource for getting the most up to date weather information. This is a direct RSS feed from the National Weather Service and is maintained by them. If you get the message that "Butler County Ohio Weather Updates is not available at the moment" then no weather alerts have been issued by the National Weather Service in Wilmington Ohio.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
